```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(lme4)
```

```{r loading data}
daly <- readxl::read_xlsx("stat414_project_data/daly_dementia.xlsx") |>
```

```{r cleaning data}
daly_clean <- daly |>
  pivot_longer(cols = 2:186, names_to = "country", values_to = "DALY") |>
  select(-1)
```
